anathema: Lie, dishonor yourself or your family, shirk your duties, break an oath
edict: Seek those who break oaths and enforce just restitution, uphold your promises
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Kols (The Oathkeeper)](/Deities.aspx?ID=449)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 304

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Dwarven Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=6)

**Edicts** Seek those who break oaths and enforce just restitution, uphold your promises

**Anathema** Lie, dishonor yourself or your family, shirk your duties, break an oath

**Area of Concern**
Duty, honor, promises

**Pantheons**
[Stone's Blood](/Deities.aspx?ID=382)

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** none

**Divine Skill** [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)

**Favored Weapon** [Light Hammer](/Weapons.aspx?ID=384)

**Domains** [Duty](/Domains.aspx?ID=108), [Knowledge](/Domains.aspx?ID=80), [Might](/Domains.aspx?ID=83), [Truth](/Domains.aspx?ID=95)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Confidence](/Domains.aspx?ID=67), [Glyph](/Domains.aspx?ID=109), [Secrecy](/Domains.aspx?ID=91)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Phantasmal Minion](/Spells.aspx?ID=1631)

- **4th**
[Suggestion](/Spells.aspx?ID=1693)

- **8th**
[Unrelenting Observation](/Spells.aspx?ID=1734)

</column>
name: Kols (The Oathkeeper)
